data.title: Facebook Page Categories List [2024]
data.meta_description: As Facebook continues to evolve, so do the options for businesses when it comes to creating a Facebook page. One of the features is the ability to choose
data.text:
As Facebook continues to evolve, so do the options for businesses when it comes to creating a Facebook page. One of the features is the ability to choose categories for your page. This can be helpful in organizing and branding your page. In this blog post, we will discuss the different categories available and how to choose the ones that are right for you!

P.S. Want to grow your business using Facebook? In SocialAppsHQ, we offer a variety of FB accounts that you could choose from, depending on the size and needs for growth you want to achieve with this platform!

What are Facebook page categories?

Facebook page categories are designed to help potential customers and fans understand what your business is about at a glance.

You can select up to three categories when you create your page, and the first category you choose will appear next to your page name and under your cover photo.

The other two categories will appear in the About section of your page. It’s important to choose categories that accurately represent your business.

Why is it Important To Choose The Right Facebook Business Page Categories?

There are a few reasons why it’s important to choose the right categories for your page.

Easier to be Found: When people are searching for businesses on Facebook, one of the ways they can find pages is by looking at the categories that are associated with that page. If you have correctly categorized your page, it will be much easier for potential customers to find you!

Recommended Facebook Page: Facebook recommends pages to users based on the categories they have selected.

These are just a few of the reasons why it’s important to choose the right categories for your page. When you are creating your page, take some time to think about which categories best fit your business. You can always change them later if you need to!

Related Post: Facebook Best Practices To Grow Your Presence Faster

List of the Types of Facebook Business Page Categories

Now that we’ve discussed why it’s important to choose the right categories for your page, it’s also crucial to understand the distinctions between a Facebook Page vs. Facebook Group. While selecting the right category for your page is essential, it’s equally vital to make an informed decision between these two Facebook features. Explore the differences to help you weigh the pros and cons and choose the most suitable option for your online community. Below is a long list of categories, so make sure you take your time to scroll through and find the ones that are right for you!

Pro Tip: To effectively leverage Facebook for your business in 2024, ensure you select the most accurate categories for your page. Begin by understanding your business offerings and target audience. Analyze competitors’ categories for inspiration. Remember, you can pick up to three categories to best represent your page, enhancing discoverability. To update categories, go to “Edit Page Info,” choose relevant categories, and save changes. This simple step can greatly improve your page’s visibility and relevance on Facebook.

How to change Facebook business page categories?

Now that you know all of the Facebook page categories that are available to you, it’s time to learn how to change your category.

If you need to change your Facebook business page category, it’s actually really easy to do. Here’s a step-by-step guide:

1. Go to your Facebook page that you want to edit and click on “Edit Page Info”

2. Once you’re on the “Edit Page Info” page, scroll down until you see the “Category” section.

3. You can start making edits to your category.

To remove a Facebook page category, you just need to click on the “X” next to the category name.

You can also add Facebook page categories by typing in the category name and then selecting it from the drop-down menu.

Remember, you can only select up to three Facebook page categories for your business page. So choose wisely!

Once you’re done making changes, click “Save Changes” and you’re all set!

Tips To Choose The RIght Category For My Facebook Business Page

As you can see, there are a lot of Facebook page categories to choose from.

So, how do you know which ones are right for your business?

Here are a few tips:

Understand Your Business: The first step is to really understand what your business does. What products or services do you offer?

Your Facebook page category should be reflective of that.

Think About Your Target Audience: Who are you trying to reach with your Facebook page? Consider what interests or needs your target audience might have when choosing your categories.

Check Your Competitors: See what categories your competitors have selected for their Facebook pages. This can give you some ideas of which ones might be a good fit for your business.

Choose Relevant Categories: Once you have a good understanding of your business and target audience, it should be relatively easy to choose relevant categories for your page.

Remember, you can always change your Facebook page category later if you need to. So don’t stress too much about it!

Frequently Asked Questions About Facebook Page Categories List

We received a lot of questions about Facebook page categories, so we decided to answer a few of the most popular ones.

Here are some frequently asked questions about Facebook page categories:

Can I have more than one category for my Facebook page?

Yes! You can actually have up to three different categories for your Facebook business page.

To add multiple categories, just follow the steps above.

“Choose a category that describes what type of business, organization or topic the page represents. you can add up to 3.” What does this mean?

You’ll see this text when you are editing your Facebook page categories. Basically, it means that you can select up to three different categories for your page. You don’t need to fill all three categories, but you can if you want to.

How do I know if I’ve chosen the right category for my page?

There’s no one-size-fits-all answer to this question. It really depends on your business and target audience.

That being said, a good rule of thumb is to choose categories that accurately reflect what your business does and that will be relevant to your target audience.

Can I change my Facebook page category later?

Yes! If you need to change your Facebook page category later on, you can do so easily. Just follow the steps outlined in this blog post and you’ll be all set.

Conclusion

As you can see, there’s a lot to consider when it comes to choosing Facebook page categories.

But don’t worry! Just take your time, do your research, and you’ll be sure to choose the perfect categories for your business.

Still have questions about Facebook page categories? Leave us a comment below and we’ll be happy to help!
